text.section: Before meeting in a closed or open session, a public body shall give reasonable advance notice of the session.

Whenever reasonable, a notice under this section shall:
be in writing;
include the date, time, and place of the session; and
if appropriate, include a statement that a part or all of a meeting may be conducted in closed session.
A public body shall keep a copy of a notice provided under this section for at least 1 year after the date of the session.
